episodes.title: 🔥 Abdullah Hashem’s 12 Mahdis Theory Collapse - Divine Protection or Cult Deception 🔥
episodes.description:
For years, the Ahmadi Religion of Peace & Light' has claimed that there are 12 divinely protected Mahdis who come after Prophet Muhammad (saw) and the Twelve Imams (a). But who are these Mahdis and why the secrecy? These belief are hidden from the public.

In this video, we expose:

– The true identities behind their so-called “Mahdis”
– The contradictions in their reincarnation based theology
– The apostasy and downfall of these supposed Mahdis
– Secret belief of the 12th Imam & 12th Mahdi

What they conceal or fail to understand themselves is their belief that the 12th Imam (ajf) has died and reincarnated into their 12th Mahdi who is from illegitimate birth. 

In reality, their teachings render the 12th Imam irrelevant and redundant — replaced by recycled identities, fallen figures, and spiritual imposters. They claim that “The Will” protects from misguidance, yet it has only led them deeper into deception, contradiction, and chaos.
